original: Kroon, Gustaf-Adblf, taxerinigsiinten-dent, Växjö, f. 6/ia/06 i Älmhults ka-pelilförs., Krono’b. k, av kyrko^h. Josef K. o. Ingeborg Pontén. G. 38 m. Karin Öberg. ~ Stud:ex. 25, jur. kand. 30. Tj:gjort å landskont. i Kronob. län sed. 30, utnämnd t. e. o. länsassessor 416, tf. tax:intend. 44, ord. sed. 47.
translated: Kroon, Gustaf-Adolf, tax inspector, Växjö, born on June 6, 1906 in Älmhults kapellförs., Kronoberg County, son of church minister Josef K. and Ingeborg Pontén. Married in 1938 to Karin Öberg. Completed secondary school in 1925 and obtained a law degree in 1930. Worked at the county office in Kronoberg County since 1930, appointed as temporary deputy judge in 1946, acting tax inspector in 1944, and became regular tax inspector in 1947.
